translation: four days of the Great Vehicle fast
On the eighth day of the second month.
On the eighth day of the fourth month.
On the eighth day of the fifth month.
On the fifteenth day of the seventh month.
In the third month of the year, it's the long purification month.
It was the ninth month of the fifth month in the first month.
On the sixth day of purification.

source_sentence: 八日十四日十五日二十三日二十八日三十日。
translation: It's the eighth, fourteenth, fifteenth, twenty-third, twenty-eighth, and thirtieth days.
On the tenth day of purification.

source_sentence: 月一日善惡憍童子下念。
translation: On the first day of the moon, he had a thought under Good and bad children.
On the 14th day, he examined the order and asked for a record.
On the fifteenth day, it's under the great deity of the five destinies.
On the eighteenth day, it was under King Yama.
On the twenty-third day, it's under the general of heavenly armies.
On the twenty-fourth day, it was under Indra.
On the twenty-eighth day, it was under Taishan's command.
On the twenty-nineth day, it's below the four heavenly kings.
On the thirtyth day, he went down to the earth's office in Tian Cao.

source_sentence: 一日童子下念定光如來佛除齋除罪四十劫不墮刀槍地獄。
translation: One day, the boy thought to himself, 'The Tathāgata Buddha of Concentration Light is freed from purification and forty eons without falling into the hell of swords and spears.'

source_sentence: 八日太子下念藥師琉璃光佛除齋除罪三十劫不墮粉草地獄。
translation: On the eighth day, the prince recited the name of the Healing Buddha Lapis Lazuli Radiant Buddha to remove the sins of purification for thirty eons and didn't fall into the hell of powdered grass.

source_sentence: 十四日察命下念賢劫千佛除齋除罪一千劫不墮鑊湯地獄。
translation: On the fourteenth day, he examined and ordered a thousand buddhas of the good eon to remove the precepts and sins for 1,000 eons without falling into the cauldron-boiling hell.

source_sentence: 十五日五道大將軍下念阿彌陀佛除齋除罪二百劫不墮寒氷地獄。
translation: On the fifteenth day, the great generals of the five destinies will recite the name of Amitâbha Buddha to remove the precepts and sins for 200 eons without falling into the cold ice hell.

source_sentence: 十八日閻羅王下念觀世音菩薩除齋除罪九十劫不墮劍樹地獄。
translation: On the eighteenth day, King Yama recited the name of Avalokiteśvara Bodhisattva to remove the precepts and sins for ninety eons without falling into the sword-tree hell.

source_sentence: 二十三日天大將軍下念盧舍那佛除齋除罪一千劫不墮餓鬼地獄。
translation: On the twenty-third day, the general army of gods recites the name of Rocana Buddha to remove the precepts and sins for 1,000 eons and doesn't fall into the hell of hungry ghosts.

source_sentence: 二十四日太山府君下念地藏菩薩除齋除罪九十劫不墮纔截地獄。
translation: On the twenty-fourth day, the ruler of Mount Tai paid homage to Kṣitigarbha Bodhisattva and extinguished his sins for ninety eons without falling into the hell of merely cutting off.

source_sentence: 二十八日天帝釋下念阿彌陀佛除齋除罪一千劫不墮鐵鋸地獄。
translation: On the twenty-eighth day, Śakra Devānām-Indra recites the name of Amitâbha Buddha and removes his sins for 1,000 eons without falling into the hell of iron saw.

source_sentence: 二十九日四天王下念藥王藥上菩薩除齋除罪七千劫不墮磑磨地獄。
translation: On the twenty-nineth day, under the four heavenly kings, he recites the name of the Medicine King and the Medicine Superior Bodhisattva to remove the sins for 7,000 eons and doesn't fall into the hell of debilitating bondage.

source_sentence: 三十日大梵天王下念釋迦牟尼佛除齋除罪八千劫不墮寒氷。
translation: For thirty days, the great king of Brahmā recites the name of Śākyamuni Buddha to remove purification and sins for 8,000 eons without falling into the cold ice.
